top_articles.title: Critical Flaws Exposed Gardyn Smart Gardens to Remote Hacking
top_articles.summary: CISA has released an advisory to warn about four vulnerabilities discovered by a researcher in Gardyn Home and Gardyn Studio.

top_articles.title: Zyxel Patches Critical Vulnerability in Many Device Models
top_articles.summary: The issue impacts the UPnP function of multiple device models and could be exploited for remote code execution.

top_articles.title: Trend Micro warns of critical Apex One code execution flaws
top_articles.summary: Trend Micro has patched two critical Apex One vulnerabilities that allow attackers to gain remote code execution (RCE) on vulnerable Windows systems.

top_articles.title: Cisco Patches Catalyst SD-WAN Zero-Day Exploited by Highly Sophisticated Hackers
top_articles.summary: Already added to CISA’s KEV catalog, the flaw allows attackers to bypass authentication and gain administrative privileges.

top_articles.title: SolarWinds Patches Four Critical Serv-U Vulnerabilities
top_articles.summary: The four security defects could be exploited for remote code execution but require administrative privileges.
